summary:
My version of an lorefriendly new Race: 
The Ohmes-Raht are one of the several different breeds of Khajiit. Similar to the race of men, save for their short, light-colored fur, the Ohmes-raht may easily be mistaken as men at a distance.
descriptionHtml:
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[ENGLISH]
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Hello!
Sorry for my english, its not the best, i hope you can unterstand me :)

I would like to show you my new race, a subspecies of the Khajiit: the Ohmes-Raht

This is my first mod and I have take a long time to create it. Even if there is already a good Ohmes-Raht mod, I would like to show you my version, perhaps someone like it. :)

SKILLS

+ 10 Sneak
+ 5 Light armor
+ 5 Illusion
+ 5 Archery
+ 5 Pickpocket
+ 5 lockpicking

SKILLS/RESISTANCE

- vulnerable against fire (- 30% fire resistance)
+ resistant to Frost (+ 30% cold resistance)
+ Night vision
+ agility (for a short time move quickly)
	
The vampire & Werewolfmorph should work (thanks to the expired6978 script), but at the moment i have found no time to test it.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
IF YOU LIKE MY MOD, PLEASE ENDORSE IT ! :)
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

ALTERNATIVES
	
If my Ohmes-Raht are not the right interpretation for you and you want a more khajiit-like version follow this link:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418
Here can you find a great Ohmes-Raht mod from Mr. Angelmeats

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[GERMAN]
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Hallo!

Ich möchte Euch meine neue Rasse, eine Unterart der Khajiit, vorstellen: Die Ohmes-Raht

Dies ist mein erster Mod und ich hab lange Zeit gebraucht um diesen zu erstellen. Auch wenn es mittlerweile schon eine gute Ohmes-Raht Mod gibt, möchte ich Euch auch meine Version zeigen, vielleicht findet jemand Gefallen daran. :)

Fertigkeiten

+10 Schleichen
+5 Leichte Rüstung
+5 Illusion
+5 Bogenschütze
+5 Taschendieb
+5 Schlösser Knacken

Fähigkeiten/Resistenzen

- anfällig gegen Feuer (-30% Feuerresistenz)
+ resistent gegen Frost (+30% Kälteresistenz)
+ Nachtsicht
+ Gewandheit (für kurze Zeit schnell bewegen)

Die Vampir- u. Werewolfverwandlung sollte funktionieren (dank des Scriptes von expired6978), ich bin aber selbst noch nicht dazugekommen es zu testen.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
--------------------
Release Notes:
--------------------

Changes Version 1.1

*) better textures for male and female - especially for ears, neck, hand, foot (they are not perfect, but realy better like the old ones - look at the new screenshots
*) change Vampire Race height to Ohmes-Raht height
*) change Vampire texture color to grey 

Changes Version 1.2
*) 3 New Mainfiles -> look at the new screenshot
   *) UNP
   *) CBBE
   *) NORMAL (normal Version with underwear)
*) New optional File: German Version
*) better normal-maps for female and male
*) change description on this side and ingame the name \"Ohmes-Rath\" to \"Ohmes-Raht\" ;)

Changes Version 1.3
*)  new optional Files englisch & german
LOREFRIENDLY version, with woodelf face, without catears

Don`t forget to endorse me :)
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------
Credits:
----------
calyps - For his Khajiit Cat Ears
FallenAngle - For his Snow Leopard Khajiits Textures
expired6978 - For his Tutorial and Files \"Creating a Playable Race - The right way\"
Dimon - UNP Dimonized body
Caliente - CBBE female body
author: Brazoragh
